Dialogue.Page: Aw, c’mon buddy, you didn’t really think you weren’t gonna hear from your buddy Hal, did you?
When I was walking by the museum a couple months ago and heard all of the travelers planning this, I knew that I had to get in on it.
I mean seriously, we’ve been best buds since we were hatchlings, I’m borderline insulted that they didn’t ask for me to participate!
...Not really, of course, I know that there’s a certain camaraderie that you travelers have that doesn’t quite extend to the ground crew, so it makes sense that they wanted to do something for ya.
I’m honestly actually kinda flattered with how quickly they roped me into it once I asked.

... I know that it’s a big system out there, and a small village down here, but don’t forget about me, okay? I know exploring space and finally having a good translator to figure out what the Nomai were all about is a really big deal, but we’ve been such close friends for so long and, y’know…
That’s a big deal to me, probably one of the biggest deals.
Anyway, aahhh I’m running out of tape, the last part of the combo is the middle button okayflysafeby-
The recording ends abruptly as it reaches the end of the tape.
